patch.author: Alex Bettadapur <alexbettadapur@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Fixing filteredAssign function

minor.author: Christian Gonzalez <christianjordangonzalez@gmail.com>
minor.comment: Add assertNever function for exhaustive null checking

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Fixing typings for TypeScript 2.4.1 compatibility.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating library comments.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Customizer `setDefault` method moved to GlobalSettings `setValue` helper. This patches the customization code in 2 ways: 1. Multiple copies of the Customizer on the page will no longer create script errors complaining about missing themes, and 2. React is no longer pulled into the styling graph.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Removing localstorage persistence for rtl helpers.

patch.author: Christian Gonzalez <christianjordangonzalez@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Enable forceConsistentCasingInFileNames tsconfig option

minor.author: jijizz <liu_zhi8@hotmail.com>
minor.comment: Add FabricPerformance utility to measure performance

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: isTabbableElement: fixed edge cases with identifying focusable elements that have tabIndex assigned.

patch.author: Chad Sheets <cjsheets@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Focus Utility should respect tabindex=-1 on tabable elements

minor.author: Christian Gonzalez <christianjordangonzalez@gmail.com>
minor.comment: Enable no implicit any in utilities package

patch.author: soorajpurandare <soorajashutosh@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Adding a try-catch around setting RTL in local storage for the browser

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adding tslib dependency to reduce re

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Customizer/customizable: adjusting to take in fields, rather than a single string representing the thing to customize.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: memoize: returns the callback in scenarios where WeakMap isn't available.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: getDocument/getWindow: now checks for doc/win undefined before accessing, making them ssr happy.

patch.author: Thomas Michon <thomas@michon.com>
patch.comment: Update Focus handling to suport immediately-nested focus zones

patch.author: Ryo Miyake <ryo.studiom@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Introduce prop-types instead of React.PropTypes

major.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
major.comment: memoize/memoizeFunction: memoize converted to a decorator, memoizeFunction is now for memoizing functions.

major.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
major.comment: getLangauge/setLanguage: new apis added for getting/setting the language normally specified on the html lang attribute.

patch.author: Kristian Halle <khalle@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Utilities: Fixed incorrect calculation of initials. Properly remove unwanted ASCII characters, and do not calculate initials for Arabic and CJK based languages.

patch.author: Christian Gonzalez <christianjordangonzalez@gmail.com>
patch.comment: Add utlities for unit tests that need to override or spy on React lifecycle methods

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: warn: Making ISettingsMap have optionals so that the warn utilities can be used for Prop interfaces containing required params.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding memoize utility. Updating css to handle serializable objects. Updating rtl helper to respect a localStorage setting.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: getRTL: fixing an issue to ensure it is once again SSR friendly.

patch.author: Chris Schlechty <cschlechty@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Removes label from native properties

patch.author: jostrick <jostrick@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: withViewport: Preserving the `forceUpdate` parameter when asynchronously re-resolving the viewport size.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating setRTL to write isRTL to local storage. This allows the setting to persist across sessions.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding warn utilities for console logging warnings on misuse.

minor.author: Christopher Schleiden <cschleiden@live.de>
minor.comment: overflow: Utilities for detecting overflow in elements

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: BaseComponent: added support for resolving `componentRef` automatically. Also added `_warnDeprecations` and `_warnMutualExclusion` helpers for warning on misuse.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding `setBodyScroll` method to enable/disable body scrolling. Useful for Overlay scenarios where you would want to disable the scrolling behind the overlay.

minor.author: Johanna Hawkins <jo.hawkins@hotmail.com>
minor.comment: Adding some utility functions to handle date range calculations and determining if a date falls within a date range.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adjusting React peer dependency to i

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating package.json dependencies to exclude typings packages.

patch.author: Christopher Schleiden <cschleiden@live.de>
patch.comment: autobind: Does not re-bind every time a decorated method is accessed anymore.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: rtl utility should read rtl attribute on first read.

major.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
major.comment: Introducing a new package to contain all baseline utilities that are commonly used amongst Fabric components.
